How many of you guys come here?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): How many of you guys come here?
By DurahanDanLP on Sunday, January 8, 2012 - 10:29 am:

I learned about this site in 2000 or so. I used it endlessly and have clicked on every thread to date lol. I check in on the site every now and then to see if anything is new and I'm always super excited to see there are new posts. Not so much to see what the thread is (although I will read it), but for the simple fact that people are still playing and inquiring about this game so many years later. I still fire up MR2 every so often and I bet you do, too. So who checks in from time to time (other than Lisa!)?

By TheWindupMan on Friday, April 20, 2012 - 01:45 pm:

I'm here, and I finally got an account! Been hanging around this site for years but just started posting. I wish there was a more active MR2 community. It's a really old game at this point, but in my opinion it's STILL the best monster rancher game. There's just so much to do, so many things to unlock, so many different monsters to raise.

By Silver Latios on Wednesday, March 13, 2013 - 07:07 pm:

Another one here! This game was my childhood, riddled with Gamesshark or not. I went through a revival a few years ago after coming across a working copy... Since then I've stalked this site like crazy, and thanks to it I'm still making new accomplishments today. So I've been a long-time(a year and a half consistently checking for new stuff) reader who finally decided to get an account. It amazes me how many dedicated MR fans are still out there; just finding this website has been a huge inspiration to me. Many thanks from this rancher to every other one who reads this. :')
